lead_paragraph: KUGEL--Florence Ann, on January 6, 2016. Beloved wife of Barry for 60 years. Devoted mother of Beth, Alisa and Marty. Adoring grandmother of Avital, Richie, Ezra, Annabelle and Hillel. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to MJHS hospice care. Services Sunday, January 10th, 12pm, at "The Riverside" 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KUGEL, FLORENCE ANN
